Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the glycosyl hydrolase 22 family (Chitinase class I subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Defense against chitin containing fungal pathogens.
Sequence Information.Catalytic activity: Random hydrolysis of N-acetyl-beta-D-glucosaminide (1->4)-beta-linkages in chitin and chitodextrins.

Literature.Title: Analysis of the soluble cell wall proteome of gymnosperms.
